sections.pali: ‘‘Yathā vanaṃ cittalataṃ pabhāsati, uyyānaseṭṭhaṃ tidasānamuttamaṃ; Tathūpamaṃ tuyhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati antalikkhe.
‘‘Deviddhipattosi mahānubhāvo, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ; Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
‘‘Ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke, opānabhūtā gharamāvasimha; Annañca pānañca pasannacittā, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adamha.
‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti. Dutiyaagāriyavimānaṃ dutiyaṃ.
